info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 9:06PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fairfield and south central New Haven Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 906 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trumbull, or 7 miles northwest of Bridgeport, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Milford, Shelton, Newtown, Fairfield, Stratford, Trumbull, Monroe, Orange, Weston, Redding, West Haven, Easton and Woodmont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
